Title: Establishes pilot programs for the field testing of mobile phones and portable devices for the county of Westchester and the county of Kings
Summary: Establishes optional pilot programs for the county of Westchester and the county of Kings, for local police departments to use electronic scanning devices to determine whether or not the operator of a vehicle was using a mobile phone or portable electronic device near the time of an accident or collision.
LawCode: Add ยง1225-e, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to creating pilot programs for the field testing of mobile telephones or portable electronic devices by local police departments in Westchester county and Kings county; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
